default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I, I don't know what a Sinner is... Sob, all of you gang up on one little kid!

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: Rewards are only for good kids, right?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: Who do you want to turn into a doll, Chief? I can do it for you!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Please protect me, Chief!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Eh—All I did was just wave my hand. Why have they stopped moving?

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Wow—they are so incredible. They even dare to resist my control.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Dolls, be good!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Strange... I can't feel my body...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Ma'am! Ma'am! Ma'am!/Sir! Sir! Sir! You like me calling you that, don't you?!

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: The wounds... w-were from falling over accidentally! Everyone at the Bureau h-has been very nice to me...

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Don't listen to them. I'm so cute and well-behaved. Of course I won't bully others.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Ma'am/Sir... They don't let me go out on my own to play... J-jailbreak? What's that? I don't understand.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I'm so jealous of "The Homeless" in Syndicate. They manage to live in such a dangerous place on their own, unlike me, who can do nothing without Chief!

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Look! Isn't this doll as cute as me? But... its heart has been slit open by the baddies. I can't fix it no matter how hard I try... Can you help me, Chief?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Will we never be separated if you have been turned into a doll... Hmm? I'm not lying this time!

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: If a kid has done lots and lots of bad things, but they have repented, will you hate them, Chief? ...I don't want to be hated, especially by you.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Some other idiots said I'm not a "good kid." What should I do... Well, let me go sort them out while Chief is away!

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Are you looking for trouble?! ...Hahaha, gotcha! I was just pulling your leg. Didn't I do a great job?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Why are you staring at me like this, Chief?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Shouldn't I leave this kind of manual work to adults? I just want to stay with you, Chief.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I worked sooo hard for you, Chief. Are you not gonna praise me?

default.title: Level Up
default.text: I knew you'd like me best, Chief!

default.title: Deploy
default.text: For you... I will gather the courage to enter the battlefield!
